auth.resetLinkSent: We've sent you a password reset link
auth.emailVerificationSuccess: Your email has been verified successfully

emailVerificationPage.title: Verify your email address
emailVerificationPage.sentTo: We have sent a verification link to:
emailVerificationPage.instructions: Click on the link to complete the verification process.
emailVerificationPage.noteDescription: You might need to check your spam folder.
emailVerificationPage.helperText: Once you have verified your email, you can click on "{{returnLabel}}" to log in.

emailVerifiedPage.successDescription: You can close this page and continue using this application
emailVerifiedPage.failedDescription: We're sorry, something has gone wrong. Please try again later

forgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPasswordPage.description: Enter your email to reset your password!
forgotPasswordPage.clickLinkInstructions: Click the link in the email to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.checkSpamFolder: If you don't see an email from us, try checking your junk or spam folder.

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.connectionError: Unable to connect to the server.
errors.connectionErrorDescription: Please check your internet connection and try again.
